item.description: We will be reading 'The Language of Flowers' by Vanessa Diffenbaugh for our March Book Club Discussion. The description from the cover follows: The Victorian language of flowers was used to convey romantic expressions: honesuckle for devotion, asters for patience and red roses for love. But for Victoria Jones, it's been more useful in communicating grief, mistrust and solitude...

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: March Book Club Meetup
